title: Looking For Casters! Amateur+
body:
Hey guys, 
I'm looking for some casters who are keen to work with me for some events! If you were ever interested in casting or even have experience in it, feel free to add me in game and we can talk!

Looking for people who are committed and wish to evolve.

IGN: Ksubi

Thanks!
Ksubi. {{item:2010}}
